CEEvent.Name: Concubine_Devotion_1
CEEvent.Text: {=TBRandomEvents_Solo007}As you sit by the campfire, relaxing after a long day of travel, your concubine approaches with silent grace. CEEvent.Name: Concubine_Devotion_5
